description: I'm a full-time Application developer specializing in APS.NET and ASP.NETCore. But work continues after the 40 hours shift for me. I am a handyman in my free time because it is a joifull activity. I can do plumbming, electrical, landscaping, light mechanics; you name it... If I dont know it, I'll learn it.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about solving problems, stay active. Can't love enough outdoor activities, like baseball, basketball, cornhole, camping, fishing, off-road. Anything that takes our minds and bodies out of the rutine.
